Introduction

Hey there! ðŸ‘‹ If you’re running your applications on Kubernetes, you might already know that things can go wrong in unexpected ways. That’s where chaos engineering comes in! Chaos engineering is all about intentionally injecting failures into your system to see how it behaves under stress. The idea is to discover weaknesses and fix them before they can cause real problems.

Today, we’re diving into Chaos Mesh, an awesome tool that makes chaos engineering in Kubernetes super easy and fun (well, as fun as breaking things can be!). We’ll go step-by-step through setting up Chaos Mesh and show you how to run some cool chaos experiments to test your app’s resilience.
